article.Heading: Initial teething problems are addressed & more people filing returns: GSTN Chairman
article.Summary: In an interview with CNBC-TV18’s Timsy Jaipuria, Chairman of goods and services tax (GST) network Ajay Bhushan Pandey spoke about the latest happenings.
article.Body:
In an interview with CNBC-TV18’s Timsy Jaipuria, Chairman of goods and services tax (GST) network Ajay Bhushan Pandey spoke about the latest happenings.

People are now finding convenient to file the returns. If you compare the returns filed for the month of October compared to the previous month, approximately 5 lakh more people have filed returns in this month, he said.

Around 80 lakh people have filed returns in November, he added.

Total returns filed during the last four months is three crore ten lakh returns, said Pandey.

Many of the initial teething problems were addressed and more and more people are filing returns, he further mentioned.

For more, watch accompanying video...
